space.network

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.network.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    The Client class manages the local version of the game state, applying changes from the server as well as from local input. Changes caused by local input are sent to the connected server.
    Author:
    James Greenwood-Thessman (300289004)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(java.lang.String host,
      int port,
      WorldLoader loader,
      KeyBinding keyBinding,
      int prevId)
       throws java.io.IOException,
              SaveFileNotValidException
        Creates a game client that connects to a server.
        Parameters:
        host - the host name of the server
        port - the port of the server
        loader - the world loader that will load the world sent by the server
        prevId - the previous ID used when connecting to the server
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        SaveFileNotValidException

      • Client

        public Client(java.lang.String host,
      int port,
      WorldLoader loader,
      KeyBinding keyBinding)
       throws java.io.IOException,
              SaveFileNotValidException
        Creates a game client that connects to a server as a new player.
        Parameters:
        host - the host name of the server
        port - the port of the server
        loader - the world loader that will load the world sent by the server
        keyBinding - the key bindings model
        Throws:
        SaveFileNotValidException
        java.io.IOException

        public void shutdown(java.lang.String reason)
        Shuts down the client and alerts all client listeners of the reason.
        Parameters:
        reason - a brief explanation of why the client has shutdown

      • addListener

        public boolean addListener(ClientListener listener)
        Adds a listener to the client. The listener will be alerted of critical events that occur.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to add
        Returns:
        Whether the listener was added successfully

      • removeListener

        public boolean removeListener(ClientListener listener)
        Removes a listener to the client. The listener will no longer be alerted of critical events that occur.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to remove
        Returns:
        Whether the listener was removed successfully

            Player from,

        Transfers a pickup from a player to a container.
        Parameters:
        pickup - the entity being transferred
        from - the player whose inventory contains the entity
        to - the container that will hold the entity
